title: Support liquidity mining program of 1inch and SushiSwap
body:
We propose that the 1inch liquidity mining program and SushiSwap liquidity mining program participants will be rewarded with 50’000 $OPIUM tokens for 1inch pool and 25’000 $OPIUM tokens for SushiSwap pool from the Ecosystem Fund every week for 4 weeks via DR.OPIUM mechanism starting 1st March 2021.

Read full proposal and discussion on the governance forum: https://forum.opium.network/t/support-liquidity-mining-program-of-1inch-and-sushiswap/149
author: 0x55E170F82F50298188eecCe988e17046Dbef56A0
